entry.title: Pumpkin on FIRE | simple HALLOWEEN carving

media:group.media:title: Pumpkin on FIRE | simple HALLOWEEN carving
media:group.media:description:

entry.title: Pumpkin art as you've NEVER seen before | Pumpkinfestival Ludwigsburg 2022

media:group.media:title: Pumpkin art as you've NEVER seen before | Pumpkinfestival Ludwigsburg 2022
media:group.media:description:
Last week we visited the pumpkin festival in Ludwigsburg! It was absolutely amazing! We have seen so many beautiful pumpkin artworks. We had seen some pictures, but we never expected it to be this wonderful! We hope you enjoy the video as much as we do.

media:group.media:title: Pumpkin Weigh Off Oldebroek | 2022
media:group.media:description:
This year’s pumpkin weigh off took place at Fruittuin Verbeek Oldebroek. Even pumpkin growers from Belgium visited the event with their Atlantic Giants. Our Halloween pumpkin weighed 74 KG and is the heaviest Halloween pumpkin weight in the Netherlands! Our green Squash was also the heaviest of the Netherlands. Our Atlantic Giant was not as heavy as we hoped, but we are still very happy with the results. All together it was a wonderful pumpkin day. Of course we are already looking forward to next year's weigh off!
#pumpkins #pumpkinfarm #harvest #happyharvest #harvestseason #pumpkinseason #growlegendary #plagron #pompoen #pompoenen #pompoenseizoen #oogsten #pumpkinfestival #giantpumpkins #reuzenpompoenen #AtlanticGiant

entry.title: THE timelapse of 2022 | From seed to 300 kg pumpkin

media:group.media:title: THE timelapse of 2022 | From seed to 300 kg pumpkin
media:group.media:description:
Hello everyone! We worked very hard to make another great timelapse for you! This pumpkin is not as big and beautiful as last years pumpkin, but we love it anyway!
The seed was planted on 10 april 2022 and pumpkin was harvest on 17 september 2022.
The sheet is placed on top of the pumpkin to block out sunlight. So the pumpkin does not ripen and can grow for a longer period of time.
It is so amazing to see how fast a pumpkin plant can grow, plants are amazing right?!
#sizematters #timelapse #pumpkins #giantpumpkins #fall #autumn #timelapses #watchthegrowth #herfst #pompoenen #pompoeneriewezep #harvest #harvestseason #reuzenpompoen #pumpkin #growing

entry.title: TIMELAPSE | Pumpkin getting ready for Halloween

media:group.media:title: TIMELAPSE | Pumpkin getting ready for Halloween
media:group.media:description:
We have another AMAZING timelapse for you guys! We filmed a close-up timelapse of a Halloween Pumpkin (Field Pumpkin) turning orange. This timelapse was filmed over a period of 2 weeks. We hope you enjoy watching this process of a green pumpkin turning into a beautiful Halloween Pumpkin!

entry.title: A tour through our pumpkin store

media:group.media:title: A tour through our pumpkin store
media:group.media:description:
Welcome to Pompoenerie Wezep.
In this video we show you our pumpkin business. We had some succesvol start-up weeks and now we are harvesting, washing and selling pumpkins almost fulltime!
But no time to relax because Halloween is coming up and we are going to make a spectacular display!

entry.title: Timelapse | A WONDERFUL day in the life of a pumpkin flower

media:group.media:title: Timelapse | A WONDERFUL day in the life of a pumpkin flower
media:group.media:description:
A pumpkin flower only blooms once, between sunrise and noon.
So this timelapse is just from one day and the small pumpkin is already forming behind the flower.

entry.title: Due to drought we had to make our own watering system

media:group.media:title: Due to drought we had to make our own watering system
media:group.media:description:
To make sure all the pumpkins keep on growing well we made our own watering system with sprinklers.
Especially the giant pumpkins needed water, to keep on track for growing a 500 kg pumpkin outside.

entry.title: Update: Going For a 700 kg Pumpkin and weeds are taking over!

media:group.media:title: Update: Going For a 700 kg Pumpkin and weeds are taking over!
media:group.media:description:
Pumpkin update 🎃
We dug up the whole greenhouse and added nutrition to the soil. We also installed the drip irrigation. Only the best plant can stay in the greenhouse, that is why one plant was removed. The remaining pumpkin plant 🌱 is now starting to grow faster and faster. The first female flowers are already visible! We also sowed and planted the giant sunflowers 🌻 in the flower bed! 🐝 It’s also time to tackle those fast-growing weeds! Next to pumpkin growers, we’re starting to be tour guides as well! We gave our Indonesian friend and his family a tour around the pumpkin patch 🚜
#giantpumpkins #growlegendary #sizematters #farming #pumpkins #agriculture #flowerbed #bees #pumpkins #farmlife #teamwork
